author: Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
title: US clinical trials of hydroxychloroquine hit 'warp speed,' could show in weeks whether it works on coronavirus
description: Researchers at NYU Langone on March 24 launched one of the nation's largest hydroxychloroquine studies and enrolled their first patient 10 days later.
content:
A bottle of Prasco Laboratories Hydroxychloroquine Sulphate is arranged for a photograph in the Queens borough of New York, U.S., on Tuesday, April 7, 2020.
Researchers are working as quickly as science will allow to determine whether hydroxychloroquine, a d… [+9158 chars]
